<summary>Notes</summary>
<br>
**Agent:** <br>Histoplasma capsulatum (misnomer, no capsule present)
<br><br>
**Epidemiology:** Endemic disease in North, Central, and South America, Africa, and Asia, but also cases reported from Europe.
<br><br>
**Treatment:** <br>Usually not necessary. In case of disseminated disease (e.g. in immunocompromised), antifungal treatment.
<br><br>
**Microscopy:** <br> Small, budding, intracellular yeast in tissue, 2 - 5 microns in diameter. 

<br>
**Reference:** <br>https://academic.oup.com/cid/article/45/7/807/541502
